name: GEOMETRY HOOK
description:
Thank you for checking out my First ever Game Jame Game and First game I created myself. I had so many ideas for the first day and i tried many of them but with my current skillset i couldn't create any of them like a snake game / jumpking hybrid.

Sorry for the bad art I'm not an artist and I had 10  minutes to make the menu and once again I'm not an artist and to make sure i finish on time I made it barebones.

My interpretation of joined together is that the hooks join to cube to the wall. Its a pretty big stretch but because of all the testing i did on the first day I only had 20 hrs to do this and this is my first time building a game without much help. I did have to watch a video of grapple mechanics because my code would slingshot the player.

Once again thank you <3
